dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The Keyword Parser tool analyzes all of the individual words within a field and determines the total number of occurances. The top keywords are returned within the output table.

Returned Fields: [Keyword, Count, Total, Percent]

tool.name: KeywordParser

param.name: inputTable
param.dialogReference: Selete table with field to be analyzed.

param.name: searchField
param.dialogReference:
Select field to be analyzed.

Each word within field will be analyzed separately.

param.name: outputTable
param.dialogReference: Select output table for keywords and occurances.

param.name: numKeywords
param.dialogReference: Select the number of top keywords to be returned.

param.name: exWords
param.dialogReference:
Select additional words to be excluded from the top keywords (separate words with a comma).

The following words are already excluded from list:

[about, and, are, but, for, from, have, http, just, like, some, still, the, that, then, they, this, was, what, when, will, with, would, you, your,]

tool.summary:
The Keyword Parser tool analyzes all of the individual words within a field and determines the total number of occurances. The top keywords are returned within the output table.

Returned Fields: [Keyword, Count, Total, Percent]
